GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on destination blkaddr during recovery

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit ed854f10e6afd5cbd5c3274d4c4df4bfe0ab4362. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check on destination blkaddr during recovery
